# HandleChangeCurrentStreamFormat

**Instance Method**

Tells the stream the format is changing.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t HandleChangeCurrentStreamFormat(const IOUserAudioStreamBasicDescription * in_format);
```

## Parameters

- **in_format**: The stream format to set, if possible, as an `IOUserAudioStreamBasicDescription`.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. For a list of error codes, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Discussion

The default implementation calls [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioStream/SetCurrentStreamFormat] and returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess]. Subclass and override this method to handle changes to the stream format and return [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] upon success.

## Managing Stream Changes

- **HandleChangeStreamIsActive**: Tells the stream the activity state is changing.
- **DeviceSampleRateChanged**: Updates stream formats, in response to the owning audio device changing its sample rate.
